name: My Solar Energy
description: Ottimizzazione dellautoconsumo e monitoraggio impianti fotovoltaici monofase e trifase. Dati consultabili in tempo reale in ogni momento e su qualsiasi dispositivo mobile.  Misure visualizzate:  - energia prodotta dallimpianto fotovoltaico - energia scambiata (immessa/prelevata) con la rete - consumi:calcolo dellenergia consumata dal cliente - autoconsumo Optimization of self-consumption and monitoring of single-phase and three-phase photovoltaic systems. Data that can be consulted in real time at any time and on any mobile device.  Displayed measures:  - energy produced by the photovoltaic system - energy exchanged (injected / withdrawn) with the grid - consumption: calculation of the energy consumed by the customer - self-consumption
